Sentencas: Ni-cermet fuel electrode-supported microtubular solid oxide cells with single layer Sm0.2Ce0.8O1.9 (SDC) electrolyte and bilayer YSZ/SDC electrolyte are fabricated for CO2/CO redox operations, i.e., NiO-SDC/SDC/PrBaCo2O5+delta and NiO-SDC/YSZ/SDC/PrBaCo2O5+delta, respectively.
Titulo: Fabrication and characterization of microtubular solid oxide cells for CO2/CO redox operations

Sentencas: The substrate fuel electrode features radially well-aligned microchannels, which are open at the inner surface of the substrate, enabling facile fuel/gas diffusion.
Titulo: Fabrication and characterization of microtubular solid oxide cells for CO2/CO redox operations

Sentencas: With CO/CO2 mixture gas as fuel, the SOFC performance of the single layer electrolyte cell is significantly improved over the bilayer electrolyte counterpart.
Titulo: Fabrication and characterization of microtubular solid oxide cells for CO2/CO redox operations

Sentencas: However, due to the current leakage through the SDC electrolyte, the Faraday efficiency of the single layer electrolyte cell in SOEC mode is < 14%, even though the input current is very high at a given applied cell voltage, while the bilayer electrolyte cell may achieve Faraday efficiencies of 90% and above.
Titulo: Fabrication and characterization of microtubular solid oxide cells for CO2/CO redox operations

Sentencas: Other different behaviors are also identified between the two cells.
Titulo: Fabrication and characterization of microtubular solid oxide cells for CO2/CO redox operations

Sentencas: The study also emphasizes the important role of a purely ionic conducting electrolyte for CO2 electrolysis operation with microtubular cells.
Titulo: Fabrication and characterization of microtubular solid oxide cells for CO2/CO redox operations

Sentencas: The substrate NiO-SDC electrode is fabricated using dual-layer spinning extrusion process in combination with phase inversion method.
Titulo: Fabrication and characterization of microtubular solid oxide cells for CO2/CO redox operations

Sentencas: After heat treatment, the substrate electrode features radially well aligned microchannels, open at the inner surface.
Titulo: Fabrication and characterization of microtubular solid oxide cells for CO2/CO redox operations

Sentencas: Built upon substrate electrode, dense and thin film electrolyte layer as well as oxygen electrode layer are fabricated through dip-coating and sintering alternatively, forming microtubular solid oxide cells.
Titulo: Fabrication and characterization of microtubular solid oxide cells for CO2/CO redox operations

Sentencas: CO2/CO redox operations with the fabricated microtubular cells are systematically studied.
Titulo: Fabrication and characterization of microtubular solid oxide cells for CO2/CO redox operations
Fabrication and characterization of microtubular solid oxide cells for CO2/CO redox operations
